thread.title: Xi says 'without reform' no progress for business in China
thread.title_full: Xi says 'without reform' no progress for business in China

author: GENE JOHNSON and PHUONG LE
title: Xi says 'without reform' no progress for business in China
text:
Xi says 'without reform' no progress for business in China Associated Press | 0 comments 
SEATTLE (AP) — Chinese   addressed Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos, billionaire investor Warren Buffett and other top American and Chinese business leaders Wednesday, vowing that his country would work to   investment and improve   protections. 
Xi's conference with the business leaders in Seattle was part of a busy day.
